alert.note: Alert for McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MCKENZIE COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM CDT... At 820 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Trotters, or 30 miles southwest of Watford City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern McKenzie County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
